Class COM.sootNsmoke.jvm.FieldOrMethodInfo 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----COM.sootNsmoke.jvm.FieldOrMethodInfo
public class FieldOrMethodInfo
extends Object
The base class of FieldInfo and MethodInfo. In the class file, FieldInfo structures and MethodInfo structures are almost identical, except for the types of attributes that they support.

See Also:
FieldInfo, MethodInfo
